content: I've been working on a new resource builder that is aimed at easily building 'webs' of resources to represent clinical scenarios. Intended for education, I've blogged about it here: https://fhirblog.com/2017/01/09/building-a-set-of-resources-in-fhir/
Great blog. I cannot read the images. Are the 100% versions available? Thanks.
Hi Michael - thanks! You should be able to download them directly - they should be full size afaik...
